website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, fade-resistant outdoor umbrella at a good price. Mold- and mildew-resistant polyester fabric cuts out 98% of UV rays, making summer days on the patio a pleasure.
pros: The classic style, durability, and price make this umbrella a winner
cons: A nice addition to your patio that will provide comfort for many years as long as it's properly cared for

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Functional Umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: We Love Love Love these umbrellas! I bought 3 (2 turquoise & 1 lime) in May for our pool area. They've been out all summer (many 100 degree days) & the color is still great! They're easy to raise, lower & tilt. I love the crank-to-tilt feature! All of our guests comment on how pretty they are. We lower them every evening, but leave them in the tables. They were unaffected by thunderstorms & wind. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, deep red, has so far stood up to a blistering Southern summer. Very sturdy. Easy to wind up and down even for my arthritic hands, which was a key purchasing feature for me. Tilt mechanism is easy... Just keep winding the handle until the umbrella tilts to the position you want. I did not want to have to fight with a button mechanism so this was an important feature for me and it's easy to operate. The umbrella came essentially assembled already (just 2 pieces) and arrived super fast. Excellent product and very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: brains on fire

customer_reviews.title: Appears very well made.
customer_reviews.text: We put this bad boy up 4 days ago. Beautiful turquoise color. I have great hopes for the pole and crank. Looks sturdy and well made. Easy to use/crank. It replaces an 8 YO umbrella that was made from sunbrella material that also had the crank-to-tilt mechanism. That crank is a must for me due to fine motor skill issues. But I can crank the heck out of that umbrella, and no buttons to push. Jury is out on how the fabric will hold up. Right now, I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Katididnt

customer_reviews.title: This is only an 8ft umbrella, not a 9ft.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a nine foot patio umbrella that once it's open only measures eight feet. Emailed the seller and they asked for pictures. Got the pictures to the seller, including one of the umbrella open on our newly made 8' long picnic table (with a tape measure in the image showing 8' measurement) . Seller contacted the factory, factory responded to the seller with a message saying they don't make eight foot umbrellas. I'm told my only recourse is to return the umbrella. They need to relist this umbrella as an 8ft umbrella, rather than a 9ft. At least the quality is better than most, but it should be for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Abba Dabba Do!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this umbrella installed by the pool for 2 months now, and are very satisfied. Operation is smooth and easy, construction seems fairly solid, fabric is good quality, so all in all, a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: wk4bg8s

customer_reviews.title: Tilts by using the crank.  Crank is conveniently located below the closed edge of umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We wanted an umbrella that was sturdy, easy to raise, lower, and tilt. This one fit the bill. The crank for raising it is not inside the closed umbrella as our prior one was, but is below it where it can be easily accessed. The tilt mechanism works by cranking past the full open position. We are well into the 2nd season with it, and it shows no signs of wear or fading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large umbrella with a fantastic teal color
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so big! I didn't realize when I bought it how much this umbrella shades. I replaced my six foot umbrella for this umbrella and it easily shades my table and four chairs. It feels heavy, sturdy, and opens and closes with ease. The pole is bronze in color, but coordinates well with my gray patio set, because it isn't too brown. The color looks bright and cheery and I have already received a number of compliments on it. Definitely an uprgade from my faded red umbrella. There is a Velcro strap to keep it closed, which works great. We live in Utah and have very strong wind, and it stays put (when it is closed).
customer_reviews.author: Lori G.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you buy a heavy stand/base
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the 6 rib Abba umbrella I bought two years ago. The quality is good for the price. Make sure you buy a heavy enough base to go with it. The 18" base is inadequate and the instructions with the umbrella suggest 40 lbs. if used with a table and 50 lbs. without. I dented up my previous Abba umbrella because I bought the one Amazon suggested to go with it and it was not heavy enough to hold it in even a light wind inside a table.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy umbrella. Thicker 1.5" pole, beefy slats, fabric securely attached not held on by fabric pockets that tear through. Substantial hardware that feels like it will last several years at least rather than a few seasons. These are first impressions compared to a couple of cheap umbrellas we have owned, so time will tell. Value is based on a warehouse purchase, but seems like good value at full price.
customer_reviews.author: MeloFello

customer_reviews.title: but they are all good with me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these umbrellas in Lime Green....They are Neon Lime Green, but they are all good with me. I just took them out of the boxes and put them up. They were packed well and each had directions included. Both of mine had wrap around ties w/ velcro for keeping them closed. Fabric is tight knit and offer's more shade than the old one's I had gotten at a chain store. So, I'm very happy with them now. I'll let ya know if I have any problems. Great price, I would recommend purchasing them and would do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon from Carlsbad

customer_reviews.title: How to tilt the umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is beautiful and sturdy. There was only one problem. No one could figure out how to tilt it. It took 8 people to realize that you had to continue raising it until you reached the top, and then it would tilt on its own. Some how that was not made clear in the literature. Or perhaps, we were all trying too hard to figure it out. It's easy, but no one had experienced it before. It was a construction worker who figured it out. We were all afraid to break it. Now it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Judith de Toth

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT AUTO TILT AS STATED
customer_reviews.text: THIS UMBRELLA IS VERY PRETTY DARK GREEN AND i LOVE IT EXCEPT THAT IT STATED THAT IT AUTO TILTS AND NOPE IT DOES NOT. i CRANKED IT UNTIL SO TIGHT AND YET IT NEVER AUTO TILTED.
customer_reviews.author: Yolie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Crank is nice. Cover very droopy. It doesn't fit like in picture. I got the dark green. Maybe other colors are better. I don't expect this to last in the hot California sun. Material seems cheap. I wouldn't buy another. I'll keep it & hope it lasts a year. My old one lasted for years, but it was hard for me to open & the wind destroyed it. Delivery was good
customer_reviews.author: GAG

customer_reviews.title: Did not Last
customer_reviews.text: At first we liked this umbrella although it let more light through than we would have liked. But a few weeks after we bought it, a wind gust lifted it completely out of the table and when it landed it completely broke several of the staves and bent the main pole. So it went straight into the garbage. Not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Burch

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for 2018 season. Unfortunately did not use. Didn't even open the box. I opened the box yesterday, 5/27/19. After installing in my patio table, I discovered crank is BACKWARDS. Up goes down and down goes up. DOES NOT TILT!!! Cannot exchange because it has been over a year. It is BRAND NEW out of box, NEVER USED!!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti L.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I got a lemon but when I bought bought this , it was based on the good reviews and I expected that much. But just one week in and yesterday I went outside to sit under it and found one side hanging down. Upon looking further , found that the one of the arm is broken in half where the nut was, as evident in the pictures. Anyway I can’t give it more than one star, would give zero if they had an option to do that.
customer_reviews.author: zions_mainframe

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella looks great and came mostly assembled - took only 3min. to get it out of the box, put together, and set up through my patio table. However, the auto tilt feature is a little concerning. It works, but requires some firm cranking so I'm not sure if the rope will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: kenjo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Bright vibrant stripes
customer_reviews.text: We bought a house this year and i was looking for a nice umbrella to spruce up my husbands old patio furniture lol. When it came i was able to set up it by myself so i would say assembly is easy as i am not good at those things. It reclines rather easy. Does not come with bottom part that holds pole.
customer_reviews.author: anna sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Light weight umbrella - top screws into bottom - a bit cumbersome and mine didn't want to stay tight. Wind lever to open and continue winding to tilt umbrella. Mine was very stiff to wind and did not want to tilt-it takes an effort to make it tilt and it feels like you're going to break it. Not a bad umbrella but with the problems I had with mine, I can't really give it two thumbs up. 3 stars to be generous.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Abba Patio® 9 Ft umbrella
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey. Very easy to operate. It appears to be well made and the fabric quality feels sturdy. I will update the review when the outdoor living season is over. end of 2015 season. This has been through some big wind, heavy rain and still looks and operates great!
customer_reviews.author: William Foley

customer_reviews.title: Auto Tilt- oughta no!
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella arrived, and I was immediate disappointed in the color- it is not a true red- more of burnished brown that had brief conversation with red. Since it was easy to assemble, I moved on- the crank to open the umbrella is indeed seamless but to get it to tilt, not so easy- it seems as if it a going to break the mechanism because you feel like you are forcing it. Also only tilts in one direction. It is a sturdy umbrella , well -balanced but the jury is still out on its durability long term. Paid extra to have the auto tilt- I would not recommend doing so!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Auto tilt function is great. However because the bottom pole threads onto top ...
customer_reviews.text: Auto tilt function is great. However because the bottom pole threads onto top pole and canopy, a gust of wind can cause the umbrella to spin counterclockwise. I've only had this problem when in tilt position.
customer_reviews.author: squeegeemaster

customer_reviews.title: (EDIT - Seller replaced item....) You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: (RE-EDIT The manufacturer contected me via email due inpart to this review. I received a NEW umbrella quickly without having to send back the defective unit. I changed to 3 stars as it should have been easier to contact the manufacturer) (EDIT: The manufacturer has contacted me finally. Stand by...) Great product until it broke the second day I used it. The pivot pin works it's way out after several hours in a moderate wind. Then a hammer is needed to lower it. No method of contacting seller using smart phone. Will have to use my home computer.
customer_reviews.author: Misterrobot

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella on 3/2016 and just after two seasons of use the crank has stopped functioning. My umbrella is now stuck in a half-open (or half-closed?) position and the crank just turns to no effect. Until now it seemed like a nice, sturdy umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Incredible mold resistance
customer_reviews.text: I live about a mile from the beach, and I usually wake up to a heavy dew on the entire front facade of my house and front deck. Most fabrics mold out within a few months to a year, including a very heavy duty BBQ cover. This has held up flawlessly for >4 years now!
customer_reviews.author: CAAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made Umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: The Umbrellas arrived on time & were well packaged. They are beautiful. With the tilt option you will require a weighted base of at least 50+ pounds. I used my table base & it works well. For the stand alone umbrella I used a regular base & purchased a weight kit to go around it that you will with sand. It seems to be holding the umbrella just fine. When tilted the umbrellas ia affected more by any wind or breeze. These are a beautiful red.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through a hot summer with strong winds
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Abba Patio Umbrella to replace a 10 year umbrella that came with our patio set. The Abba Umbrella is holding up to our hot, dry summer weather and our windy nights. We really like the bold red color and so far after one hot summer we have seen any fading like we have on other fabrics. The all metal construction appears to be of good quality, I'm expecting this umbrella to last just as long as the umbrella it replaced. If we had a need for a second umbrella I would purchase another Abba Patio Umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Zanke

customer_reviews.title: even when it felt like it was going to break
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how the tilt feature worked until my son-in-law looked it up in a users guide. He discovered that I just had to keep turning the handle, even when it felt like it was going to break. Then it would start to tilt. I love that it has a strap sewed in with Velcro fastener for when I put it "away". We used to use a rope to tie around our previous umbrella. The lime green color I ordered is exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: H Koza

customer_reviews.title: Nice unbrela
customer_reviews.text: It is a very attractive umbrella. Nice colors and nice configuration of stripes. It is two pieces although it is sent in one piece. The pole pieces screw together which I found somewhat difficult to put together. Also, I wish the pole was black instead of dark brown/bronze. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis H. Leimer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely umbrella and tilt functionality is great; it really brightens up the yard and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely umbrella and tilt functionality is great; it really brightens up the yard and the delivers a wide array of shade. I am finding the handle to be a little tigheter/harder than other cranks I've used in the past and I'm an active sports player; it's a little more difficult for my wife and kids so they just ask me every time. For that reason I'm docking 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Rich F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Color Selection
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these umbrellas for my hotel. I needed this particular turquoise color. It's vivid and blends well with my Aqua deco hotel in Fort Lauderdale. The cranking feature is a major plus. No pins, no button, just keep cranking until the umbrella tilts. Great feature. I usually get about 6 months out of an umbrella because of color fade. We'll see how these hold up. I recommend this product!! It's now about 6 months and I've noticed one of the 3 umbrellas is starting to fade.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: How do you 'tilt' the umbrella ?
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of the item and the coloring. However, we have tried several time to 'tilt' the umbrella and even though we have read and re-read the directions, we feel like idiots...just how is it done? Especially if the umbrella is up and in the table - the reach is awkward and we have been unsuccessful.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for year but fabric tore.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this umbrella a year ago, to replace a cheaper umbrella. This worked well last Summer and this Summer, until recently...We opened the umbrella to enjoy dinner on the deck and noticed there are a few tares, 2-3in long; in the upper part of the umbrella. It looks like possibly something from the wind tore the fabric while it was closed. I am a bit disappointed the fabric tore. It felt/looks very durable hence why I chose this umbrella brand.
customer_reviews.author: Krino

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so nice. I was extremely pleased when it arrived . It was packaged very well but when I opened it, I was even more surprised. The material is excellent and very sturdy. I live in Oklahoma City and the wind can be treacherous at times but this umbrella stood up to the wind without causing any damage. I have a 30lb base on it for support.
customer_reviews.author: Deanie

customer_reviews.title: The pole of the umbrella was too big to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The pole of the umbrella was too big to fit in the base! We had to remove the cap off the base and now it's flopping around inside the pole base until we can find something to wrap it with. Shouldn't these be standard sizes??
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product, we are getting lots of sun these days, this is a must have item for summer time! Super easy to assemble, basically there're only two parts. We had thunderstorm yesterday although the umbrella was totally fine. It's definitely heavy duty material. Will see if how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bellalala

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Glad it's made of metal and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Glad it's made of metal and not wood. The only thing keeping it from a 5 star is the way they have it set up to tilt. You crank the handle to a point it puts great stress on the mechanism and then it will tilt....only in one direction. I had one previously that would tilt either way with the push of a button and that is much better. Good umbrella for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mammasawnT

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Vibrant Colour
customer_reviews.text: Excellent umbrella! This replaced one I have had for years... not only is the umbrella slightly larger than I expected, the vents at the top help prevent wind gusts from pulling at it or flipping it over (or turning it inside out). The crank handle is very easy to use (up,or down) and it really does provide good shade. I would order this one again, no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: adknative

customer_reviews.title: product not a pictured - I would ahve not placed the order
customer_reviews.text: the way the fabric is over the metal bars - see images ....it makes it look strange like the fabric is too short! I like to return but not sure it will be possible
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect! Colors look just like the pictures and the umbrella is extremely well built. Perfect height and width for my table. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Clean looking umbrella even after a storm. Well built and very sturdy. Used it in a table and it does great no matter from which direction the sun is hitting it. Nice shade keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: Grat umbrella, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the umbrella. The 9' size is perfect for a rectangular table and I think the 8 ribs looks so much nice than 6. The material is nice and thick and waterproof (important here in the Pacific NW). Color is true to the picture. The auto-tilt is also a wonderful feature!
customer_reviews.author: mtodd

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it constantly spins with the wind. Unsure if this is due to the thing holding it or the umbrella, but that's what's happening. Besides that issue, the item itself is great. Good quality, has not faded in the sun yet and we have had it for several months, bright red but not too bright, good quality pole and good quality handle. I love that it tilts.
customer_reviews.author: Camille V.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for bottom N/A
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice umbrella and I bought an exact replacement for one that broke in the wind. The bottom extension part of the pole broke in the wind but a replacement was not available. I had to buy the whole thing over again. That's why I give it three stars. If I could have bought the bottom piece alone, I'd have given it a better rating. Now I have an extra umbrella with no bottom pole.
customer_reviews.author: Locoscout

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two 7.5 Abba Umbrells for my front yard and was impressed with the quality. I ordered another brand for my back yard because the price was less and the color was what I wanted. I just sent back that 9ft umbrella to Amazon,because you would need alot of strengh inorder to crank that umbrella to full coverage . No problem with the Abba brand, so easy to crank open or close. No comparsion! Love my Abba umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression; strong, stable
customer_reviews.text: Only been up a few days, but was impressed by the weight of the materials. I knew it has 8 ribs which adds to stability and strength versus the 6 rib umbrella it replace. The first day it was up, it handled 20-25 MPH gusts with nary an issue or fear. So far, so good
customer_reviews.author: Hudson Valley Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great vendor- quality service
customer_reviews.text: We had a issue with our umbrella. It is well built and sturdy but had a problem with the metal parts. Vendor FedEx a new one once I sent a picture.Excellent service. Would use this vendor again in a heartbeat Howard
customer_reviews.author: Howard I Gross

customer_reviews.title: Very nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Abba umbrella and like the first, I’m very satisfied with it. The only thing that is a little hard, is getting the umbrella up high enough to make the tilt mechanism work....besides that it’s a great umbrella
customer_reviews.author: Roger G. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these umbrellas for a couple of months now and I don't open them every day, but they are still holding up. No signs of fading yet. It's not necessarily a deal breaker, but these umbrellas are not as nice as the thick cloth/canvas ones you sometimes see at restaurants. This is a thinner material, almost like a thicker nylon. But still looks nice and does the trick. We'll see how it holds up in the desert heat this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jeromie Rome

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor but not near a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the first big breeze came through, this one jumped out of the holder I wedged it into, and flipped over, breaking a rib. Done. I ordered another brand. The ribs were too thin and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: L. Browning-Towns

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella, but I wish it had a quick ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella, but I wish it had a quick release to take the pole apart. It's a pain to unscrew it while trying to balance the umbrella. Also didn't realize it was dark brown instead of black. It will do, but probably will get something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I'm hesitant
customer_reviews.text: Color far different from that pictured. More like a neon yellow green. Fabric also much more thin than my last umbrella which was just a Home Depot umbrella. I hope this will last. Update one year later- although the umbrella is under a pool screen enclosure with high grade sun blocking it is now sunshine yellow. Does not hold color at all. However, mechanism and fabric are both in very good shape. We take it in in winter but living in Florida it is out most of the year. Less suny areas may find this perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella for the price. The color is brilliant lime green, looks fantastic in the sun. Smooth operation and no assembly. After waiting two months for a back-ordered canvas umbrella from Pottery Barn, I finally cancelled that order in disgust and replaced with this one. Although this umbrella is polyester, it looks sturdy and will clean easily. So glad I got it. It arrived in 2 days! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice umbrella when it arrived but soon one of the arms snapped. Great customer service replaced the umbrella and within a week it happened again. Was given a refund in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella. Love the color.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Make sure you read the instruction on how to make it tilt. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have probably purchased 6 or more of these umbrellas over time. They fade after about a year in the sun. Just bought covers for my newest ones. They tear fairly easily if snagged but I think they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: tls78754

customer_reviews.title: Light, Bright and Easy Up
customer_reviews.text: Came in quite quickly. Ridiculously easy to assemble and worked exactly as indicated by the seller and various reviewers. Was not sure what to expect..initially I thought a 9' canopy would not be large enough, but it definitely exceeded my expectations - more than enough coverage. The teal color is very vibrant as well. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ZNV

customer_reviews.title: They won't let me return😞
customer_reviews.text: Really up set. my umbrella broke today I only had a month and a half. I don't understand why there's no Highwinds no nothing and I've been taking good care of it😞
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The Abba construction is excellent. The color is awful
customer_reviews.text: The Abba construction is excellent. The color is awful. I'm going to return it. It does NOT look like the picture. The actual color is more yellow. I'm disappointed, but bought another color since it is a good qualify and well priced product.
customer_reviews.author: IceDancer2020

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect at the table by my pool! Assembly was a breeze and the colors are bold and bright! It's easy to crank up, tilt, or to let down. It has a wide strap with velcro to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Poss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Umbrella By The Pool
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is used by the pool. We take it in and out when needed. It is so easy to use and store. It's a great size and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Family Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Provides a nice amount of shade but be careful when it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Provides a nice amount of shade but be careful when it is windy! If you have the umbrella tilted and a gust of wind comes along, it will take the umbrella with it (Whether it is stand alone or in the center of a table and the stand under the table. The wind will lift it out and take it for a spin)
customer_reviews.author: Cat J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the crank tilt mechanism. It is pretty hard to tilt, when I cranked it the first time I thought the mechanism was going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Spike's Dad

customer_reviews.title: and the color is perfect. The only thing I have had trouble with ...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is exactly as advertised. It is so well made and sturday, and the color is perfect. The only thing I have had trouble with is the tilt -I don't have that down pat yet. Thank you. Doris Brown
customer_reviews.author: Doris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is great. The tilt mechanism has worked out great for us. Sturdy. The color is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good umbrella. When I have it closed and then open it shows a lot of wrinkles in fabric. I have never had one do that.
customer_reviews.author: CaNwa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality umbrella
customer_reviews.text: 3 years the hot sun and it still hasn’t faded or worn out in any way. I don’t even put it away during winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mixuone

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was on sale, since I did order it at the end of the pool season! The color of the umbrella matches my pool furniture. I know I will really enjoy using it next year and years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Carver

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I received this umbrella and it feels so big! After the yard is opened, it can cover almost half of the yard's sunshine, then sit under the umbrella and enjoy the food. Life is wonderful! It is the only regret that there is no sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality-don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella didn't last the summer as far as keeping it's color. Started to fade in the sun immediately and we ended up not using it again. This season we purchased a Sunbrella cover which kept it vibrancy in spite of the unusually hot weather this year.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was some super big and heavy, rich looking umbrella.... it's not. This umbrella is the same as the one's I've seen at Depot this year for much less money! It is a good umbrella, well made and the color is nice.... but, it's nothing special!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyK

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful green color brightens the courtyard; so far mechanism works great; was easy to assemble. Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kales

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Looks nice, but is a bit of a headache.
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella looks very nice out of the box, so no worries there. If you are a person that lives alone and are interested in using the tilt function, keep looking. You will need to turn the crank very firmly, while also firmly pushing on the top of the umbrella. Very, very difficult to do alone. Also, because the pole is two pieces that screw together, the slightest breeze will turn the tilted umbrella, even with a sturdy base. Three stars because it looks nice, minus two because the tilt function needs a significant amount of work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight yet durable. I live in a very windy area and so far it has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but the pole broke.
customer_reviews.text: Update. It blew over, a few months of ownership, and several canopy arms broke. Color is true. , easy crank and tilt. Trying to figure out how to order just the pole? any suggestions here would help.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: easy to tilt
customer_reviews.text: its a great umbrella for my patio. nice to just crank it to tilt it. no buttons to push. i'm in a power chair and an tilt the umbrella when I need to. Looks great too
customer_reviews.author: J. S. PAGANO

customer_reviews.title: One minute setup
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation - had it out of the box, assembled, and opened up within one minute. Seems very sturdy and it has a nice thick pole which created a nice snug fit into the table and the umbrella base, which should leave less room for wobbling in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the bright green umbrella. Have only had it a short time but so far we love it. It appears well made and looks great around our pool deck.
customer_reviews.author: lswice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Love the automatic tilt! I can never reach the manual type because I'm under 5-feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: Jen J.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm satisfied but not overly impressed. I've only had it up a few days so I can't comment on how much the color fades from the sun. Pros: very easy to assemble, provides nice shade under my patio table. Cons: Green color is more yellowish than it appears in the picture, crank is very loud, using the tilt function takes a decent amount of force.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is a very good umbrella. I bought another one before, at another distributor, and lasted long time but it was not as good as this one.... sometimes it is better to pay a little extra and get what we need.
customer_reviews.author: M. Glantz

customer_reviews.title: Color is exactly as displayed on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, durability, and color. It matches our other larger umbrella and chair cushions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DLD

customer_reviews.title: Great color, doesn't fade.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the sturdiness of the pole. Loved it so much my fiance bought another one for out by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought in October 2017. Carefully used. Stored in winter in original box. Yesterday the string inside the pole broke off the pulley when I was opening it. I thought it was pretty and functional, but it's not apparently sturdy as other reviewers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: NancyC

customer_reviews.title: Love for sun coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Great for sun coverage, but with base too hard to hold up at ball games when there’s still a breeze going on.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a worn out umbrella based on its good reviews. The umbrella appears to be well-made. We have it on our deck in a free standing base. Cranking mechanism appears to be better made than most.
customer_reviews.author: JSA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome umbrella. Easy assembly, easy to use, great coverage from the sun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and a lot larger then we thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a lot larger then we thought it would be. We use it to cover the bar bq grill while grilling in the rain! We live in the SE and get a lot of rain in the afternoons. It has a nice crank handle and also a tilt feature. You can tilt it with the sun.
customer_reviews.author: FaithyP

customer_reviews.title: OK all is well
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella is ok... but the "auto tilt" is not working. Worse is the fact that, despite a couple attempts, I cannot reach anyone to find out how to make it work. Absolutely no response from the dealer. OK... dealer reached me (after more than a month) very apologetically and gave me the proper instructions. Umbrella is now working well and actually pretty terrific.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: love It
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good quality exactly what I wanted at a decent price
customer_reviews.author: K. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very Good and Reasonably Priced Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built; easy to install and open; nice colors, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto Tilt Doesn't work returned same day I received
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and liked color. Put up and went to use the auto tilt this model has. Didn't work as the whole top section popped off. Returned same day I received. Very poor quality on the tilt functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Priusux

customer_reviews.title: We are thrilled with our new pool umbrellas.
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 concrete tables around our pool and we put the 6 new umbrellas out today. They were easily put together, crank up effortlessly and when open, give a remarkable shade. We especially like the strap with a velcro closure which secures the umbrella firmly when not in use. They appear quite sturdy and have a vent on the top which allows wind flow. For the price, I feel we got a great buy. Our pool furniture is turquoise and white and the umbrellas match perfectly. Observers have remarked that they add a "touch of class" to our pool area.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. Impressive quality. I've had it all Summer and leave it up always and the color has stayed vibrant. My only negative about it was the packaging. It came in an exceptionally sturdy box however it seemed like it had hundreds of yards of industrial grade tape on it which took forever to get through.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Right size for a 6 foot table.
customer_reviews.text: Love the umbrella like the color great for a 6 foot table.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Sitzlar

customer_reviews.title: Having trouble getting the umbrella to close ..
customer_reviews.text: I have had this umbrella for two months bad it up for only one month . It is raining and I cannot get the umbrella to crank down . There is a screw that is sticking out . Last time this happened my husband had to hammer it in . I will call company and see why this is occurring. Other than that I loved the umbrella ! I ordered the red and it was perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Linda D"Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Appears we’ll built
customer_reviews.text: I have not set up my umbrella yet but, it arrived quickly, was lovingly packaged, And fairly priced
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. We are using it on a backyard deck. Have had it for about a month. We have some pretty strong wind as we live near the coast and have had no issues due to the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I pulled this umbrella out of the box. I was not prepared for the quality! You get a lot of impressive bang for the buck with this product! It is taller than my previous umbrella, which is great! I think this one will last a few seasons!
customer_reviews.author: April Dawn Murph

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Super umbrella for the deck. Heavy duty, and I like the Velcro closure for when the umbrella is closed. Plus, when wanting to tilt the umbrella, the cranking motion is really nice. Great product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Scott

product_meta.title: Abba Patio 9 Feet Patio Umbrella Market Outdoor Table Umbrella with Auto Tilt and Crank, Turquoise
product_meta.description: Color:TurquoiseFeaturing a sturdy, rust-resistant aluminum frame, powder-coated in bronze finish, The umbrella canopy is made from weather & fade resistant outdoor fabric that is designed to withstand the elements. Easy to open & close with a crank mechanism, The auto tilt allows the umbrella to be repositioned to provide shade throughout the day.
feature_bullets: Vented canopy for air flow; Umbrella Base is not included, please Search B00SUU7V1I, B00SUUCE3S, B01DLGTFBO, B06XKQR5Q8 to get the matched Abba umbrella base

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars783 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
